mapper.select: SELECT board_id, user_id as writer,title,content,reg_date,likes,hits FROM board as b join member as m on b.user_key=m.user_key where board_id >=#{boardId}-1 and board_id <=#{boardId}+1;
SELECT b.user_key,board_id, user_id as writer,title,content,reg_date,likes,hits FROM board as b join member as m on b.user_key=m.user_key where board_id =#{boardId}
mapper.update: update board set hits=hits+1 where board_id=#{boardId}
mapper.select: SELECT c.user_key,comment_id,board_id,user_id,comment,reg_date FROM comment as c join member as m on c.user_key=m.user_key where board_id =#{boardId}
